segments.text: I was wondering if you wanted to go for a walk with us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid not . I'm sick . I have a fever but I'm cold , and I threw up earlier .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , man . I hope you get to feeling better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would feel better if you came over and took care of me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , then . I'll be there in a minute .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( after a while ... ) Walter ! Where are you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , whatever , I don't want to hear about it . I'll call the doctor for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's just that you have to be patient and try to relax .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Enough . I don't want to hear any more about your bathroom time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why not ? Oh well , I'm ready to eat . No need call the doctor . If we run to the restaurant , I can make it to the restroom and you can order .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you sure you want to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To the restroom ? I have no choice .
segments.speaker: S2
